4301240.name: Guap
4301240.description:
The casino has reached multiplayer. Up to four players can now attack their rent together and hopefully pay off their looming debt.

Every in-game day that passes, you will be given a randomized set of games. This system brings unique challenges, situations, and a rewarding sense of victory that can only come from beating the odds!

In GUAP, there's only one way to win. Bet it all. The odds are most definitely not in your favor. You'll have to beat them again and again if you'll want to emerge victorious.

In this casino, it's your life that's on the line. Each day, you'll have to make rent if you want to survive to the next. Eventually, though, that won't be enough. The main goal is paying off your debt, and escaping the twisted facility.

GUAP is home to many of the classic casino games you love, and takes inspiration from more modern betting games as well. As of now, Guap contains ten gambling games:

  • Blackjack

    The classic casino staple. Bet, hit, split, double, and do anything you can to beat the (evil) dealers' hand! 

  • Plinko

    Drop balls and hope to hit a huge multiplier! 

  • Mines

    The classic windows minesweeper experience, now with gambling! Every tile cleared is money in your pocket. Every tile risks a mine, and losing it all. 

  • Roulette

    What is there to say? Place your bet and watch the wheel spin. 

  • Unbox

    A case unboxing-style gambling game. Contains massive multipliers, but will they ever hit?

  • Rugged

    This one's for the stockbrokers or whatever they're called. Place your bet and pull before the crash. Good luck!

  • Limbo

    Simple as can be. Move the bar to set your odds and payout, then roll the dice!

  • Sic-bo

    An ancient Chinese traditional gambling game. Invented along with the first dice in the heart of Emperor Chun Woo's dungeon. Three dice, and you can bet on nearly any outcome.

  • The Golden Dome

    This is a GUAP original. Bet on missiles which have a small chance of piercing the golden dome, a missile defense system. If it does, then you'll hit a ground target and receive a payout based on its value. Hit the same target enough and you'll get an even larger reward for its destruction!

  • F-Racer!

    These horses (frogs) can race! Choose your favorite and watch them move.
4301240.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
